group_1.textRight: Shit!@The hell did he get stabbed for?!
Hey, you were there!@Did you guys get in a fight?

group_1.textLeft: No, not at all!@The guy was a total stranger.
But he said something,@like he knew we were Blue Seas.

group_1.textRight: If these guys are nursin' a grudge against us,@we should hurry and make the first move...

group_1.textLeft: We should all calm down and let @the police handle it.
If we all recklessly give chase, we'll either get hurt, @or hurt people and get arrested.

group_1.textRight: And right when the Blue Seas Family's been working hard to change their image, too...
But I can't just sit around and do nothing.
And I still don't trust the police.
Meiyui... what the police did to us...
Surely you haven't forgotten about it.

group_1.narration: Three years ago, the Blue Seas Family faced the biggest crisis they'd ever seen.
A murder occurred among a smuggling ring@in Minaminagi port.
Of course, the group had nothing to do with the Blue Seas,@but the police saw an opportunity in this case.
They teamed up with the prosecutors@and tried to frame us as the culprits,@rounding up the Family on false arrests.
Then a miracle happened,@and Kyubey appeared before me.
I made a contract to become a magical girl,@and managed to falsify@their perfect fabrication with my wish...@The police probably had no idea what happened.

group_1.textRight: Miraculously, the lies got exposed@and we were spared.
But knowing that it was faked makes it impossible @to trust the police.

group_1.textLeft: But the police and prosecutors involved in the false arrests were all punished.
The police in Minaminagi are all clean now, are they not?

group_1.textRight: Hey, do you really believe that?
"There's different people there now",@"They're doing things differently"...
That's still no reason to trust any of 'em.

group_1.textLeft: (If that's the case...@we will be denying ourselves as well...)
(The Blue Seas Family committed crimes @in the past.)
(No matter how many people we help,)

group_1.narration: Somehow, we managed to calm everyone down there...@But they only relented for now@because we had no leads on the culprit.
But with an excuse like that,@it was only a matter of time until someone lashed out,@so I definitely have to find the culprit before that happens.
I didn't tell anyone else, but I actually have a clue...@My comrade that got stabbed managed to tear@the badge from the criminal's jacket@with the last of his strength.
That badge belonged to a scouting company that was based around here...

group_1.textCenter: But, I don't see anyone suspicious around here...

group_1.narration: Because the scouting company was shut down@a long time ago by the Blue Seas Family@for the sake of public order,@the culprits harbored a grudge...

group_1.textCenter: (Even if the company no longer exists,@they might be involved.)

group_1.textRight: A labyrinth...
(No way... could it be...)
(If that's the case, it's not a crime @that the police can solve...)
(I can solve this problem on my own,@without endangering anyone.)
(Yes, I know it!@This kind of inexplicable attack...)
(It's definitely the work of a Witch!)
You let your guard down~... @So? How'd that feel?
It's only a knockoff stun gun, but still.

group_1.textLeft: (An attacker... no kiss mark...@the Witch had nothing to do with it...)

group_1.textRight: The hell, you're using a knockoff stun gun?!@Take this seriously!

group_1.textLeft: No no, I'm being serious, you know?@This lady is crazy strong.
She's the jewel of the Blue Seas Family.
A regular stun gun will only scare the hell out of a gorilla girl like that.
If you're gonna do this right, you're gonna have to change things up.

group_1.textCenter: (He's right... so what on earth did he use on me...?)
...A Myotron? @An interesting thing to be carrying around...

group_1.textRight: Yeah! You must really know your stuff.@I've customized it a fair bit though.
See, beating up and dragging a girl around isn't @really my style.
So I messed up your nerves to immobilize you.
Oh, you're not listening to me anymore.
